thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Beverly Barnette
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Beverly Barnette

author: Beverly Barnette
title: Beverly Barnette
text: Due to very stormy weather we had to cancel our Valentine's lobsters. So, we received an email for a President's special from Maine Lobster Now. We went ahead and ordered 2 lobsters along with Clams. The lobsters arrived and we commented about how well they were packaged. Great feast! I'm from Boston and I so miss lobsters and steamer clams. I will definitely be a returning customer.
